name: ts-transformer-extension
description: A browser extension which watches the network for TypeScript source code and transforms them to JavaScript.

scripts.build: npm run -s clean && mkdir -p dist/extension/ && npm run -s build:background && npm run -s build:manifest
scripts.build:background: npm run -s build:background:compile && npm run -s build:background:bundle && npm run -s build:background:esbuild
